changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM global_property WHERE property = "webservices.rest.maxResultsDefault";

changeSet.comment: Updating the global property for webservices maxResultsDefault

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM global_property WHERE property = "obs.complex_obs_dir";

changeSet.comment: Update value for obs.complex_obs_dir global property
changeSet.sql: update global_property set property_value = 'complex_obs' where property = 'obs.complex_obs_dir';
